responses.rationale: Describes a monitoring process; lacks explicit calming language.
Reports a fact about detection in states; lacks explicit calming language.
Reports a negative fact (deaths); lacks explicit calming language.
Reports facts about deaths and cause; lacks explicit calming language.
Describes actions taken (quarantine, eradication); lacks explicit calming language linked to public safety.
Provides cooking advice ('kills bacteria and viruses'); lacks the keyword 'safe' and explicit calming language.
Reports economic facts; lacks explicit calming language.
This is a question; lacks explicit calming language.
